sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import "../styles.css"; import Navbar from "../components/Navbar"; import Footer from "../components/Footer"; const Home = () => { const [isHovered1, setIsHovered1] = useState(false); const [isHovered2, setIsHovered2] = useState(false); const [isHovered3, setIsHovered3] = useState(false); const [isHovered4, setIsHovered4] = useState(false); const [isHovered5, setIsHovered5] = useState(false); const [isHovered6, setIsHovered6] = useState(false); const [serverData, setServerData] = useState(""); const handleMouseEnterCard1 = () => { setIsHovered1(true); }; const handleMouseLeaveCard1 = () => { setIsHovered1(false); }; const handleMouseEnterCard2 = () => { setIsHovered2(true); }; const handleMouseLeaveCard2 = () => { setIsHovered2(false); }; const handleMouseEnterCard3 = () => { setIsHovered3(true); }; const handleMouseLeaveCard3 = () => { setIsHovered3(false); }; const handleMouseEnterCard4 = () => { setIsHovered4(true); }; const handleMouseLeaveCard4 = () => { setIsHovered4(false); }; const handleMouseEnterCard5 = () => { setIsHovered5(true); }; const handleMouseLeaveCard5 = () => { setIsHovered5(false); }; const handleMouseEnterCard6 = () => { setIsHovered6(true); }; const handleMouseLeaveCard6 = () => { setIsHovered6(false); }; async function getComments() { try { const response = await fetch( "https://hotel-haven.onrender.com/comment/all_comments", { headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", }, } ); const data = await response.json(); if (data) { setServerData(data.comment); } else { alert("Error" + response); console.log(response); } } catch (error) { console.log(error); } } useEffect(() => { getComments(); }, []); return ( <> {/* Introduction Section */}

Welcome to Hotel Haven

{/* Room Section */}

Luxury Rooms

Standard

Our standard rooms offer chicly-designed interiors and a range of modern amenities to ensure that you enjoy a relaxed and comfortable stay.

Deluxe

Inspired by the vivid cultural history of Lahore, the Deluxe Room furnishes character with old-school charm.

Executive

Designed with chic and contemporary décor, our Executive Room furnishes a King-sized bed, a spacious bathroom, a writing desk and a minibar.

Deluxe

Inspired by the vivid cultural history of Lahore, the Deluxe Room furnishes character with old-school charm.

Business Suite

Offering comfortable and classy living, our Business Suite creates a balance between work and comfort.

Deluxe Suite

Overlooking the beautiful city of Lahore, spacious Deluxe Suite is a blend of comfort and magnificence.

{/* Mobile Room Section */}

Luxury Rooms

Standard

Our standard rooms offer chicly-designed interiors and a range of modern amenities to ensure that you enjoy a relaxed and comfortable stay.

Deluxe

Inspired by the vivid cultural history of Lahore, the Deluxe Room furnishes character with old-school charm.

Executive

Designed with chic and contemporary décor, our Executive Room furnishes a King-sized bed, a spacious bathroom, a writing desk and a minibar.

Business Suite

Offering comfortable and classy living, our Business Suite creates a balance between work and comfort.

Deluxe Suite

Overlooking the beautiful city of Lahore, spacious Deluxe Suite is a blend of comfort and magnificence.

{/* Services Section */}

Other Services

Laundry
